price: 215 en te montrant humble et bienveillant envers les croyants qui te suivent.
arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ janāḥaka limani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
